Package com.group13.tmae.model

Class Tournament

java.lang.Object
com.group13.tmae.model.Tournament
@Entity
public class Tournament
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a tournament, including its basic details and the list of participants. Also maintains a list of brackets associated with the tournament rounds.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Tournament()
    Default constructor for creating a tournament instance without setting any initial values.
    Tournament​(java.lang.Long tournamentID, java.lang.String tournamentName, java.time.LocalDate startDate, java.time.LocalDate endDate, java.lang.String location, java.lang.String websiteLink, java.lang.Integer maxNumParticipants, java.time.LocalDate registrationDeadline)
    Creates a tournament with detailed information.

  • Constructor Details

    • Tournament

      public Tournament​(java.lang.Long tournamentID, java.lang.String tournamentName, java.time.LocalDate startDate, java.time.LocalDate endDate, java.lang.String location, java.lang.String websiteLink, java.lang.Integer maxNumParticipants, java.time.LocalDate registrationDeadline)
      Creates a tournament with detailed information.
      Parameters:
      tournamentID - The unique identifier for the tournament.
      tournamentName - The name of the tournament.
      startDate - The starting date of the tournament.
      endDate - The ending date of the tournament.
      location - The location where the tournament is to be held.
      websiteLink - The link to the tournament's website.
      maxNumParticipants - The maximum number of participants allowed.
      registrationDeadline - The deadline for tournament registration.

    • Tournament

      Default constructor for creating a tournament instance without setting any initial values.
